sentences.en: Although it is very cold, don't cower back. Smile amusedly and cheer.
sentences.cn: 虽然非常寒冷, 但是请不要退缩, 开心的笑一下,加油.

sentences.en: But it was him, Jim Cower, that she still felt angry at.
sentences.cn: 但是她依然很气吉姆?考渥这个人.

sentences.en: Cower: This ability can no longer trigger effects on items that trigger from melee weapon attacks.
sentences.cn: 畏缩: 这个技能将不会再触发可以通过近战武器攻击触发的物品效果.

sentences.en: Elderly patients cower in terror as two nurses battle it out on a ward!
sentences.cn: 在两名护士为病房一决胜负的时候,年长的病人在恐惧中退缩了.

sentences.en: He has broken my teeth with gravel ; He has made me cower in the dust.
sentences.cn: 哀3:16他又用沙石碜断我的牙、用灰尘将我蒙蔽.

sentences.en: I need teachers who'll teach, not just act as police officers or cower.
sentences.cn: 我需要的是教书的老师, 而不是严厉的警官,或在恶霸面前低三下四的懦夫.

sentences.en: I will never cower before any master nor bend to any threat.
sentences.cn: 我决不会在任何一位大师面前发抖,也不会为任何恐吓所屈服.

sentences.en: Most are thrilled by the idea of export growth, but cower prospect of more imports.
sentences.cn: 大部分人既害怕大力发展出口, 又担心进口增加带来的后果.

sentences.en: Success cower a multitude of blunders.
sentences.cn: 成功包含了许许多多的过失.

sentences.en: The cower unit of the Eagle is a wellsorted lithic and glauconitic marine sandstone.
sentences.cn: 伊格尔砂岩的下部单元是分选良好的岩屑质和海相海绿石质.

sentences.en: The hostages cowered in their seats.
sentences.cn: 这些人质蜷缩在其座位上。

sentences.en: To trample upon practice is to cower before truth.
sentences.cn: 对实践的专横就是对真理的恐惧.

sentences.en: Whatever you do, don't cower, stammer or apologize.
sentences.cn: 不论怎样, 都不要畏缩 、 支吾或抱歉.

sentences.en: Will the Chinese cower before difficulties when they are not afraid even of death?
sentences.cn: 中国人死都不怕,还怕困难 吗 ?

trans.tran_en: to bend low and move back because you are frightened
